players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Diana: "Alice and Bob are accusing each other of being the mafioso, but only one of them can be telling the truth. We need more evidence or a better way to decide who to trust before voting."

Bob: "Alice is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she is the villager. Alice is the only one who could be mafia."
